parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The website ID. You can call the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) operation to obtain the ID.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the purge or prefetch task. Valid values:

*   **file** (default): purges the cache by file.
*   **preload**: prefetches the file.
*   **directory**: purges the cache by directory.
*   **ignoreParams**: purges the cache by URL with specified parameters ignored.

parameters.name: UploadTaskName
parameters.description: The name of the upload task.

parameters.name: Url
parameters.description: The OSS URL of the file that contains resources to be purged or prefetched.
